mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.our_system_order_no AS "ourSystemOrderNo", a.our_system_order_time AS "ourSystemOrderTime", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.shop_id AS "shopId", a.order_number AS "orderNumber", a.document_code AS "documentCode", a.loan_income AS "loanIncome", a.jingdou_income AS "jingdouIncome", a.distribution_costs_income AS "distributionCostsIncome", a.commission_income AS "commissionIncome", a.premium_income AS "premiumIncome", a.other_income AS "otherIncome", a.subtotal_income AS "subtotalIncome", a.loan_after_sale AS "loanAfterSale", a.jingdou_after_sale AS "jingdouAfterSale", a.distribution_costs_after_sale AS "distributionCostsAfterSale", a.commission_after_sale AS "commissionAfterSale", a.subtotal_after_sale AS "subtotalAfterSale", a.amount_procured AS "amountProcured", a.express_fee AS "expressFee", a.refunds AS "refunds", a.profit AS "profit", a.import_date AS "importDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_jingdong_profit_settlement( id, our_system_order_no, our_system_order_time, order_time, shop_id, order_number, document_code, loan_income, jingdou_income, distribution_costs_income, commission_income, premium_income, other_income, subtotal_income, loan_after_sale, jingdou_after_sale, distribution_costs_after_sale, commission_after_sale, subtotal_after_sale, amount_procured, express_fee, refunds, profit, import_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ourSystemOrderNo}, #{ourSystemOrderTime}, #{orderTime}, #{shopId}, #{orderNumber}, #{documentCode}, #{loanIncome}, #{jingdouIncome}, #{distributionCostsIncome}, #{commissionIncome}, #{premiumIncome}, #{otherIncome}, #{subtotalIncome}, #{loanAfterSale}, #{jingdouAfterSale}, #{distributionCostsAfterSale}, #{commissionAfterSale}, #{subtotalAfterSale}, #{amountProcured}, #{expressFee}, #{refunds}, #{profit}, #{importDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_jingdong_profit_settlement SET our_system_order_no = #{ourSystemOrderNo}, our_system_order_time = #{ourSystemOrderTime}, order_time = #{orderTime}, shop_id = #{shopId}, order_number = #{orderNumber}, document_code = #{documentCode}, loan_income = #{loanIncome}, jingdou_income = #{jingdouIncome}, distribution_costs_income = #{distributionCostsIncome}, commission_income = #{commissionIncome}, premium_income = #{premiumIncome}, other_income = #{otherIncome}, subtotal_income = #{subtotalIncome}, loan_after_sale = #{loanAfterSale}, jingdou_after_sale = #{jingdouAfterSale}, distribution_costs_after_sale = #{distributionCostsAfterSale}, commission_after_sale = #{commissionAfterSale}, subtotal_after_sale = #{subtotalAfterSale}, amount_procured = #{amountProcured}, express_fee = #{expressFee}, refunds = #{refunds}, profit = #{profit}, import_date = #{importDate} WHERE id = #{id}
